synopsis.text: McDonald's Japan released an animated music video mashup promoting their french fries. The video features remixes of the hit songs "Odo" by Ado and "PAKU" by asmi, mixed with the iconic McDonald's fryer alarm chime "Tirori" as the backing track. Arranged by artists Giga and TeddyLoid, this lively and catchy Tirori Mix aims to highlight McDonald's crispy fries while showing appreciation for popular culture. With its blend of pop music and fast food sounds, the quirky video promises entertainment for all ages.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
